EmailTemplate.name: Solution_Notify Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification of Solution#{!Solution.SolutionNumber} rejection.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Solution.CreatedBy},
Solution # {!Solution.SolutionNumber} has been rejected by {!Solution.Approver_Name__c} because it does not meet the CSO standards, or the information is not complete or clear. Please check the Reason field in this Solution for notes from the Reviewer.
A Solution in Rejected status should be modified by the Creator to meet the standards and then set the status to Content Review for your Team Lead/Manager to Review and Approve.
Click on the below link to view details:
{!Solution.Link}
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
